website_summaries.verdict: A superb booster seat that won't break your budget and is sure to serve you well for years to come.
pros: Requires only two clicks and a pull to secure the booster seat to a vehicle
Features a deep, foam-lined shell that absorbs crash forces and shields a child against debris
Energy-absorbing headrest keeps a child's head and neck secure at all times
cons: Overall construction is flimsy in comparison to other Britax booster seats
Seatbelt does not always retract properly

customer_reviews.title: I've never been disappointed in these products
customer_reviews.text: This is our fifth Britax car seat for our son. I've never been disappointed in these products. They are sturdy and durable, and install soundly in all three of our vehicles (full-size pickup, crossover wagon, and sports coupe). They are a little hefty to install, but that's to be expected with a quality car seat. This will probably be our last Britax, since this one will accommodate him until he grows out booster range. I strongly recommend this brand to anyone in the market for a car seat of any type.
customer_reviews.author: DadInGeorgia

customer_reviews.title: Good Booster Seat
customer_reviews.text: Nice light seat, excellen for airplane travel. I returned it because it does not have the hook tether, and all the security is provided by the seat belt. Knowing that our youngster is not the best behaving one, I replaced this one with the Britax Pioneer model, which offer a combination of full fastening like a car seat and transition to the booster; although Pioneer is significantly heavier.
customer_reviews.author: kapalua_man

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN THE OTHERS
customer_reviews.text: This seat is an EXCELLENT choice for the safety conscious parent with a young-but-tall child. Not only is there the usual shoulder-height positioner, there's also a crotch-strap positioner that holds the lap belt in place very securely. It's lightweight and easy to fasten into the car. My son loves it, too. Our only complaint is that the two pull-out cup holders don't snap into position and tend to slide back into the seat base if not occupied.
customer_reviews.author: elizabethfabri

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other booster seats, this one is noticeably more durable. It is built with the protection you would expect from Britax. The only downside is, my almost 5 years old has some issues threading the seatbelt through on his own. However, it's not enough of an issue for me to take a star away. It could be just something he has to adjust to or it could even be my car. Either way, great car seat and I feel so much better than buying him a more expensive seat knowing that the protection is there if he should ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: David Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Very cussioned!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be super comfy for my kids. I like the 2 cup holders a d the material. The back part is really wide, but I guess it is for security purposes. I bought another one that is more confortable, but I like this one best because it does not have the built in belt. You use the car belt but it has a belt holder in the seat for extra security compared to regular boosters. Great technology and modern. I do not regret getring it.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Narrow seat!
customer_reviews.text: We are big fans of Britax ever since my first child was born. Britax has never failed us and most of the product we own from Britax are very well-made and durable. I want to like Parkway, however, if your child is on the heavier side then this might not be a good fit. The seat area is very narrow, unfortunately, my kids have big bottoms so they didn't feel comfortable sitting on this booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: PiggyMaMa

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a top teather
customer_reviews.text: Good carseat I just wish the back has a top teather so it does not move toward when my son does. Also when I fees the seatbelt through the guide and pull the belt I feel like I'm going to break the guide or carseat back or both!
customer_reviews.author: aduncan06

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be the evolution that we needed and at a good price. I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest child booster car seat I've ever seen. Our other Britax car seat is a bit complicated (but quite safe). This seems to be the evolution that we needed and at a good price. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic car seat
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic car seat! Very sturdy, impressed with seat belt positioner. My 4 year old says it's very confortable. She can unbuckle herself out out of the seat. She's fallen asleep in it and the sides of the head part prevent her head from moving in an unsafe position. I love that it uses the latch to secure the seat. It is much more expensive than other boosters but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: An excellent booster with a small design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Best booster I have used for my kids, The only problem I see is that the button to release the latch strap does not work very well. On both seats I have they do not work well, you almost need to press with all your weight for them to work. Other than this design flaw it is a great booster.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos P

customer_reviews.title: ... have bought 2 of these and they both work great. My son easily gets in and out without ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these and they both work great. My son easily gets in and out without much trouble like he did in his old 5 point harness car seat. They are incredibly easy to put in and take out. And best of all it still feels sturdy and secure just like his old 5 point car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great value, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, looks good, have 2 pockets cup holders, can move forward a little when child falls a sleep, head support when child is sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and install
customer_reviews.text: I Got this car seat for my growing niece. It was Very easy to assemble and install. We were able to fit 3 car seats (a Graco and radian next to this) in the back of a fusion! The cup holders can be pushed in to "hide" or pulled out to be used. No real complaints. Is overall a really nice booster! Hope it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Britax makes excellent car seats
customer_reviews.text: Britax makes excellent car seats. This model could be improved with a tether belt for the high back. Although the lower connectors keep the booster secure, the high back moves more than I prefer without a tethering device.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and get the belt on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and get the belt on. Obviously more of a hassle than a simple booster but looks safer and our little was barely in booster range so I wanted one with the back. She’s happy.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Seems to be more durable, better quality, and more plush than most boosters. Like the cup holders on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: HulaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Safe Booster Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This chair is just what our daughter told us to buy for her son, our grandson, so he can safely ride with us. It is all it claims to be. Easy to install compared to the regular car seat! The Britax name means the chair can be trusted. We are satisfied with the purchase of this booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: I love the safety features of this booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I love the safety features of this booster seat. My 5-year-old grandson was ready to escape from his carseat, but this one still protects him. He can put on the belt himself and even fasten the piece that prevents submarining. He seems quite comfortable and looks like Captain Kirk on the bridge of his starship.
customer_reviews.author: Mamazabakaka

customer_reviews.title: Best Booster on the market
customer_reviews.text: We love this booster! I'm currently using it for my 46lb 44" 5 year old and he is very comfortable in it. I love that the cup holders slide in making this easy for a 3 across car seat install. My favorite features are the latch system with isoflex and the secure guard clip. Britax always goes above and beyond with extra safety features. My son has no issues buckling in and using the secure guard clip by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Child’s car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this child’s car seat! It works as your child grows. The booster seat has latched that attach to the car, no worries about wiggling or sliding out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome booster seat for our 5 year old boy who was ready for a 'big boy chair'. He struggles a bit to get buckled in due to the seat height but nothing he won't be able to overcome. Very solid and well constructed and a breeze to install and move between vehicles. Big fan of Britax and this exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: If there's a better made seat on market please tell me quickly
customer_reviews.text: If there's a better made seat on market please tell me quickly! To my knowledge Britax is unparalleled in design and quality. Sure, you pay more. But we're talking about the safety of your child! What better investment. (PS The patented Britax Latch clips make installation a breeze!)
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat for my elementary school child
customer_reviews.text: Love this big girl car seat! It is so easy to install using the latch system. My 6 year loves that she gets to use a seat belt like an adult. It doesn't take up as much room as the 5 point harness car seats. I am very happy with it and I love knowing that she is safe in a Britax car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Medina

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is a restrained booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a restrained booster seat, meaning, you still can snap it into the car using the latch buckles. Other boosters just rely on the actual seatbelt to hold the child, and the booster in the seat. I also like the fabric as it is more of a ripstop material and won't fade in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: tami

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat
customer_reviews.text: My son n I both loved it. The latch system keeps it in place, it's staying put. The material looks very nice, like it was custom made for my car w a black/grat interior. My sons says it's comfy n it fits just right. I feel very confident in my purchase, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paola D.

customer_reviews.title: My son is not as comfortable in this as he is in his 4Ever in ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is not as comfortable in this as he is in his 4Ever in booster mode, but it is a good option for Grandma's car. It's not that cushiony or padded, but I do like that safety strap that hooks to the seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rachel Klein

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect seat, just what I needed to keep my daughter from sliding out of her seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great seat with a small inconvenience.
customer_reviews.text: The is a good booster seat with a back rest/support. The seat padding is better on this one compared to other Graco set. And this is coming from my toddlers who ride in it all the time. The only complaint, and really, I'm knit picking compared to other seats I have handled, is the tension system for using the latch connections to the seat. You have to pull both tension straps at the same time to get even tension on both connection points. If you pull one, then the other, the seat feels loose. As compared to the seats, this is usually not the case. But as I mentioned, its not really a con, but a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: B Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put in place, easy for child to buckle, and very comfortable. Cup holders are a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this model two years ago for our older daughter and it has held up very. Even on long trips in the car, she has been comfortable. We just purchased new ones for our younger daughter. She loves it and loves the fact that she can get in and out of the car on her own.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: It's a great seat. My son is very comfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great seat. My son is very comfortable in it, and it's roomy and easy to sleep in. It is also lightweight enough that you can lug it around on flights without too much pain.
customer_reviews.author: Talkative

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my tall 5 year old with lots of room to grow. I'm really glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: K&B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and easy to put child in and out
customer_reviews.author: Zmania

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable safe booster seat for my 8 year old!
customer_reviews.author: cz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As per my experience with other Britax products, totally worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The cup holders are a great feature. The padding on the seat is thick ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two kids and have always purchased Britax seats. In my opinion the quality is top notch and the extra cost is well worth it. This seat is no exception. It is simple yet effective. The cup holders are a great feature. The padding on the seat is thick and my kid loves it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great booster seat for my son. Safe & very sturdy. Cup holders are a plus. My son can fall asleep on it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: guikay

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this seat and it is very well made. I love Britax products and both my daughters have Britax car seats. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Snyderstein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, light weight, nice cup holders. Like the detachable back.
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily and seems quite safe. When moved, however, the back section detaches from the seat too easily.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had a lot of car seats (4 kids) and this one is great
customer_reviews.author: F E Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Probable deserves 5 stars as any of my complaints I ...
customer_reviews.text: Probable deserves 5 stars as any of my complaints I believe are just transitions from going from a car seat to a boaster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Safe is a great feeling
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat and gives me the feeling that my child is fully protected. Pretty compact, yet sturdy and a trustworthy brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chick27

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, comfortable for ( nearly 7 and small) grandchild. Have always used Britax for child safety seats and always been satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep comfortable seating and locks into seat hooks which keeps it ...
customer_reviews.text: Deep comfortable seating and locks into seat hooks which keeps it in place when not occupied. Seems sturdy and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: lownoter

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this and all Britax products
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this and all Britax products. Comfortable seat for my child (5 year old boy, 46 inches tall, 47 pounds) that wasn't difficult to put together. And, it's an IIHS best buy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: For autistic 8 yr. old who persists trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: For autistic 8 yr. old who persists trying to get out of his seat belts. This helps a bit but he is quickly outgrowing it.
customer_reviews.author: HollyLa

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our 5 year old. He's much more comfortable since transitioning from the car seat. Have to say, the two cup holders are a huge hit for him.
customer_reviews.author: RMshoegirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great seat, a little hard to get the belt to slide in the holder by the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: DVS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is great, the belt is held by a little slip-on buckle between the legs, compact, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: DF_NYC

customer_reviews.title: Nice look. Great function.
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased nothing but Britax for all of our kids' seats (five seats total). They are pricey, but the quality is unmatched. This booster seat was very easy to set up, and now my five-year old can buckle and unbuckle himself no problem. He is comfortable in the seat and has lots of room to move his arms and legs, though he is also very obviously secure in there. The cup holders are a cool feature, and my son is somewhat obsessed with them, but we haven't actually used them yet. Overall, this is an attractive, simple, but effective seat. Another win for Britax.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, the padding on the seat is really ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, the padding on the seat is really soft and my kid no longer complain about her butt hurting. Unfortunately, the con is that the back rest doesn't really want to stay on the seat, and it isn't as well padded.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Lu

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$$
customer_reviews.text: This car seat has more padding than the competition. Making it very comfortable for our little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Kenmore

customer_reviews.title: my grandson really likes this booster/car seat
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install, and for my grandson to buckle up
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't give it more than 3 stars due to the loud rattling. This seat is noisy in an otherwise rattle free car. Why an engineer would design something so noisy is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: wsphawk

customer_reviews.title: Rear latch is super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Rear latch is super easy to use. Seat has very nice material with lots of cushion. It provides lots of protection for the upper body. I love it so much I bought another one with black color. I had graco booster seat (just the bottom piece) and it doesn't provide any protection like this one. I know Britax is a little pricey but I wouldn't compromise money for my child safety.
customer_reviews.author: DAN TRUONG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Britax. Very comfy. Kids love the seat and never whine about having to buckle up.
customer_reviews.author: Hsueh Shih Yi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice experience!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in Hawaii within two days. Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The quality is exception! Worth the $ if you can swing it. This is our 4th. Our children are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: June Niblack

customer_reviews.title: Just what we weee looking for. We need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we weee looking for. We need to put three car seats on the back row and with the this booster seat being narrow it fits well with our other car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S.

customer_reviews.title: My 5yr old son is totally happy with this seat
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fits LATCH anchors in my 2015 RAV4. My 5yr old son is totally happy with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander F

customer_reviews.title: I like the seat because I've always used Britax and feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the seat because I've always used Britax and feel like my kids are safe in them. My 5 year old can't quite buckle himself with this because the belt does not easily slide through the belt feeder, but I think he will be able to once he is a little bit bigger. I feel better having him in this instead of a backless booster. I like that it is narrow because I have an infant seat base right next to it and they fit fine in my Honda Pilot. The head rests are nice because he can still nap on those long days out.
customer_reviews.author: Gunde31

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and safe
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable seat. My kid asks for this seat versus others. Getting the lap belt into position takes a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: He says it's very comfortable. My son is about 45 pounds
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and he is in the second grade and still has room to grow. He says it's very comfortable. My son is about 45 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Denyce Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product!! And not over priced. My daughter really does like it
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Love the Britax and my youngest son loves it too
customer_reviews.text: Love the Britax and my youngest son loves it too!! He sits perfectly in it!! Best Buy and fast delivery as well!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina La Pinguina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Will purchase another when my grandson grows out of his current Britax car seat.
customer_reviews.author: cappybrat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty generic seat. I got it because my older one used it and overall I was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very nice car seat for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat
customer_reviews.text: Good car seat. The red button/adjustable latch straps are a bit of a pain and finicky to me, but overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rolek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit in all respects... in my truck & for my son!
customer_reviews.author: Hans M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CARSEAT!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat, fits wonderfully in my car and my child loves sitting in it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A Acquaviva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and my child is comfortable with this new Britax seat. Easy transition from other brutal seats.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!!
customer_reviews.text: My son (who is 5) says this is the most comfortable car seat he's ever had (we have only had Britax). He likes the pull out cup holders. It gives him some independence and all the safety of Britax!! I love the way it cradles his little body perfectly. You can tell it will protect him in a car accident. I only buy the best for my children!! It looks gorgeous too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dickess

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat ever
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat ever! Seat is nicely padded, it reclines very easily with your vehicles seat, nice fabric, adjustable with your child's growth, has the double latch that is controlled individually on each side, not bulky or heavy, and has the lap belt guide that helps maintain its position to not hurt your child. All around wonderful product. Received the product within two days. I bought two, one for each child aged 4 and 5.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with latch system and live how it ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with latch system and live how it fits taller kids, head rest can be raised higher than a otherseat I found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old son loves it. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son loves it. It is really soft and he is able to belt and unbelt himself.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Easy to install/uninstall. Follow instructions on how to put it together
customer_reviews.author: Janusz Oldakowski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seat is easy to install and fits my 6 year old well.
customer_reviews.author: KristinP

customer_reviews.title: Britax just rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Another awesome car seat by Britax. This is our 3rd seat and Britax never lets us down. Easy to install and my 5 year old figured out right away how to buckle himself up. A solid booster .... and It looks awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: NCMom

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: We just transferred from a car seat to this booster for our grandson and love it! Everything about this booster is quality. We travel with him frequently and appreciate the attention to safety and comfort put into this seat. The seat has a nice amount of cushion for comfort (especially on longer trips). The latches are very easy to maneuver when putting this seat in and taking it out. Really like the strap between the legs that hooks onto the lapbelt. Just a great find overall!
customer_reviews.author: Lka

customer_reviews.title: This seat would not fit in my Buick Enclave 2012 ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat would not fit in my Buick Enclave 2012. The back of the baby seat would not flush up with second seat in the vehicle due to second seat head rest in the way and cannot be removed or adjusted. This installation would be considered unsafe for use according to the manufacturer's u-tube video.
customer_reviews.author: stanley carraway

customer_reviews.title: Don't like that the back moves around
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if It can be used with latch for child or if latch system is only for unoccupied travel safety. Don't like that the back moves around. Very comfortable and easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my 4 year old. He is on the bigger side for 4, and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy for my 6 year old to get into and ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my 6 year old to get into and out of. It is her 2nd Britax, and we are pleased with the quality. It hooks right into the LATCH system in my wife's s Pathfinder and stays secured when nobody is riding in it ( I like that feature) The only "complaint" I have, is the different pricing for the colours. At the time I bought it, the pink one was $10 more than this one. Other than that, I think it is a great product and STRONGLY recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: houstonduckman

customer_reviews.title: Love this booster!!
customer_reviews.text: We love the Britax brand. We have 2 of these boosters and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Great, safe seat!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome seat, nice material. Comfortable for my 6 yr old and he loves the two cup holders (which can slide under seat when not in use). Stylish design but the Britax name is why I bought it. Thanks Amazon for the great deal, and fantastic delivery. It was so well packaged that there was no way it would have gotten damaged! Definitely recommend....
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is no back tether strap so it would not stay secure in the 3rd row of a Yukon.
customer_reviews.author: MSL

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo claimed is not comfortable. The back part of the sit is detachable ...
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo claimed is not comfortable. The back part of the sit is detachable so I did and using only a sit which I can get in Target for $30. So it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Tchourkina

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on an amazing car seat!
customer_reviews.text: My first amazon review after several years as a loyal, prime member. I felt the need to review this item since it was my first time purchasing an "amazon warehouse" deal. Brand new car seat in original packaging that looked as though it was re-packaged, probably an unused, returned product. Regardless, bargain price for a brand new car seat! Thank you amazon, you do not disappoint! Super easy to unpack and install. My daughter loves her new car seat!
customer_reviews.author: APM

customer_reviews.title: Two issues. The seat needs to be longer from ...
customer_reviews.text: Two issues. The seat needs to be longer from front to back to support legs sufficiently. Release buttons on the sides do not work. They are too flimsy to release the straps. You need to reach under the seat to manually release the straps.
customer_reviews.author: ripvwsss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, comfortable for my little guy, he loves it and I love the look and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jcarr

customer_reviews.title: unsafe at any use
customer_reviews.text: not a safe choice. The kids can lean easily forward and slip out of the shoulder strap even if you feed the shoulder strap through the guide next to the head rest. Would need a harness belt system.
customer_reviews.author: cs1

product_meta.title: Britax Parkway SGL G1.1 Belt-Positioning Booster Seat, Phantom
product_meta.description:
Superior safety delivered with remarkable convenience and comfort make the parkway SGL an exceptional choice when moving your big kid into a belt-positioning booster seat. Britax's SafeCell Impact Protection surrounds your child in safety components that work together to protect well beyond the established federal safety standards. Complete side impact protection plus provides an advanced layer of protection with a foam-lined, high-back shell and headrest designed to absorb crash energy and keep your child's head and neck extra secure.

BRAND STORY
By Britax
feature_bullets: Safecell impact protection is an integrated system of safety components, including our impact absorbing base and complete side impact protection plus, that work together to protect your child beyond the federal safety standards

SafeCell complete side impact protection plus provides an advanced level of protection: a deep, foam lined shell absorbs crash forces and shields your child from debris, and an energy-absorbing headrest keeps your child's head and neck secure

Isoflextm latch connection system provides additional safety for your whole family 2 simple clicks and a pull secures the booster to your vehicle, preventing it from becoming a projectile when not in use
The weight range for the product recommended is 40 pounds to 120 pounds
